publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2285.2 Mr Brian Monteith: Sports Promotion in Scotland's Schoolsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-2285) in the name of Allan Wilson, leave out from "and others" to end and insert "head teachers, teachers, school boards and other sports and educational bodies to embrace and participate fully in these healthy initiatives."
